Package suncertify.remote

Interface Summary
DataRegistryObserver The interface that is implemented by the object which observes the DataRegistry and reacts to its messages
RemoteDataFacade An extension of the DataFacade interface which extends Remote
RemoteDataFacadePool Pool of RemoteDataFacadePool which contains a pool of RemoteDataFacade whose instances are retrieved when needed
 

Class Summary
DataRegistry DataRegistry starts the rmi registry.
RemoteDataFacadeImpl A RemoteDataFacadeImpl object is the implementation of the RemoteDataFacade interface.
RemoteDataFacadeImpl_Stub  
RemoteFacadePoolImpl Implementation of the pool of RemoteDataFacade instances which returns a remote instance of a RemoteDataFacade when needed, using a round robin algorithm.
RemoteFacadePoolImpl_Stub  
 

Exception Summary
TooManyConnectionsException This exceptions happens when too many clients are connecting to the server
